__e: But in my game lies are everything.
Well, I did tell her I was the bank president, but I will be some day, so that's not really a lie, is it?
What was the last lie you told the person to your right?
Remember the first lie you told me, darling?
Then what you said to me back there on the river was a lie about how you never could have done it alone and how you'd lost your heart and everything.
Then what you said to me back there on the river was a lie about how you never could have done it alone and how you'd lost your heart and everything.
And is it a lie that this woman is your mother?
I know this is all a lie. That it's no good. That it's a piece of shit...
Now that's a lot of bull and you know it.
Of course you know what a lie is and what the truth is, don't you?
Can you tell me - can you explain to me what a lie is and what the truth is?
Oh, I have not told a lie, but I... I also have not told the truth.
I felt really bad about it so I didn't tell you the truth. And when you told me that you were grateful that I liked you... I tried to see if I could make myself like you.
It must have seemed to you that you hold a very strong hand. But... A very important "but", it so happens that I hold a card which you did not even know to be in the pack.
It's all been lies, hasn't it?
- Everything you told me is a lie, isn't it?
It's all a lie, isn't it?
- Everything you told me is a lie, isn't it?
What she said was all lies, wasn't it?
It's all a lie, isn't it?
Now do you understand why you can't use that stinking lie to save your neck!
Can you give me one good reason why I would lie to you?
It is not a lie to keep the truth to oneself.
